articles.title: Boy, 6, dies after being hit by car in crosswalk in Maryland
articles.description: COLUMBIA, Md. (AP) — A 6-year-old boy has died and his mother was injured after both were hit by a car while in a crosswalk in Maryland.
articles.content:
COLUMBIA, Md. (AP) A 6-year-old boy has died and his mother was injured after both were hit by a car while in a crosswalk in Maryland.
